Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.employee

Interface ManagerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagerServiceImpl
public interface ManagerService
This interface defines the operations that can be performed by a Manager.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

  • Method Details

    • assignTask

      Task assignTask(UUID employeeID, String name, String description, LocalDate dueDate)
      Assigns a task to an employee.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - the ID of the employee to assign the task to
      name - the name of the task
      description - the description of the task
      dueDate - the due date of the task
      Returns:
      the assigned task

    • getManagedEmployees

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Employee> getManagedEmployees(UUID managerID, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Gets a list of employees managed by the manager.
      Parameters:
      managerID - the ID of the manager
      pageable - the pageable object for pagination
      Returns:
      a page of managed employees

    • reviewJobApplication

      JobApplication reviewJobApplication(UUID jobID, UUID applicantID)
      Reviews a job application for a specific job opening.
      Parameters:
      jobID - the ID of the job opening
      applicantID - the ID of the applicant
      Returns:
      the reviewed job application

    • approveJobApplication

      JobApplication approveJobApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
      Approves a job application for a specific job opening.
      Parameters:
      jobApplication - the job application to approve
      Returns:
      the approved job application
